alert.note: Alert for Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 4:12AM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected including along SR-95 near Bullfrog.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell
